projects.title: HeartWave
projects.description: Developed a heart rate monitor software with Qt and SQL, integrating real-time biofeedback to measure, analyze, and display elaborate heart rate variability patterns

projects.title: OrderUp
projects.description: Created a food ordering web app with JavaScript and HTML to execute user logins, display menus, and order items, alongside CSS to enhance UI designs

projects.title: EasyCart
projects.description: Developed a desktop shopping cart app, using Java and JavaFX to implement menu displays, calculations, and item orders
